alert.note: Alert for Putnam (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 17 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Showers with embedded thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Fairfield and eastern Putnam Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 558 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers with embedded thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wingdale to Carmel. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mahopac, Lake Carmel, Sherman, Brewster, New Fairfield, Carmel, Patterson, Putnam Lake and Brewster Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
